label: Task-5
title: Write article from all role responses to stakeholder interview
description: Collect all 9 role responses to the stakeholder interview (Dev, Architect, QA, AppSec, DevOps, Librarian, Cartographer, Historian, Conductor) and write a feature article showing how each role interpreted the stakeholder's vision. This is the synthesis article. The original interview transcript is at publications/interviews/2026-02-10/v0.1.3__chatgtp-stakeholder__raw-interview.md. It was also published as a LinkedIn article: 'I Was Just Interviewed by ChatGPT on Behalf of One of My Claude Code Agents'. Wait for all 9 Phase 1 role responses to be completed before writing.
